remarks: Substitution expressed in terms of two quantifications over singletons. (Contributed by AV, 22-Dec-2019.)
statement:
ralsng.1 $e |- ( x = A -> ( ph <-> ps ) ) $.
2ralsng.1 $e |- ( y = B -> ( ps <-> ch ) ) $.
2ralsng $p |- ( ( A e. V /\ B e. W ) -> ( A. x e. { A } A. y e. { B } ph <-> ch ) ) $.
$d A x y $.
$d B x y $.
$d ch y $.
$d ps x $.
